function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global supply chain disruptions due to unpredictable shocks","Impact":"Reduced availability of essential goods and services during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, increased domestic production, stockpiling of critical goods","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring systems, predictive analytics, inventory management software","People":"General population, healthcare systems, businesses reliant on international trade","Owner":"Government, businesses, international organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of industries to disruptions in global supply chains","Impact":"Reduced capacity to respond to public health emergencies, economic downturns, and other shocks","Mitigation":"Assessment of vulnerability, diversification of supply sources, development of contingency plans","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, supply chain mapping software, scenario planning models","People":"Businesses, industry associations, government agencies","Owner":"Industry associations, government agencies"},{"Description":"International interdependencies and vulnerabilities in value chains","Impact":"Decreased resilience to external shocks and disasters, including pandemics","Mitigation":"Increased collaboration, information sharing, and coordination among countries and sectors","Technologies":"Trade modeling systems, data analytics, communication platforms","People":"Policy makers, international organizations, businesses participating in global value chains","Owner":"International organizations, policy makers"}]}
